sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The BIND package contains dig, host, rndc, rndc-confgen, named-checkconf, named-checkzone, lwresd, named, dnssec-signzone, dnssec-signkey, dnssec-keygen, dnssec-makekeyset and nsupdate.

sect3.title: host
sect3.para: host is a utility for DNS lookups.

sect3.title: rndc
sect3.para: rndc controls the operation of BIND.

sect3.title: named-checkconf
sect3.para: named-checkconf checks the syntax of named.conf files.

sect3.title: lwresd
sect3.para: lwresd is a caching-only name server for local process use.

sect3.title: named
sect3.para: named is the name server daemon.

sect3.title: dnssec-signzone
sect3.para: dnssec-signzone generates signed versions of zone files.

sect3.title: dnssec-signkey
sect3.para: dnssec-signkey signs zone file key sets.

sect3.title: dnssec-keygen
sect3.para: dnssec-keygen is a key generator for secure DNS.

sect3.title: dnssec-makekeyset
sect3.para: dnssec-makekeyset generates a key set from one or more keys created by dnssec-keygen.

sect3.title: nsupdate
sect3.para: nsupdate is used to submit DNS update requests.
